alert.note: Alert for Lower Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 14 at 11:06AM MST until December 14 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts 60 to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Lower Snake River Plain, including Pocatello, Chubbuck, American Falls, Aberdeen and Fort Hall. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MST this afternoon. Winds will decrease with passage of the cold front. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind damage is ongoing in the Pocatello area, including trees, signage and roof debris. Please use caution driving through the area, and give emergency crews space to work.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
